title: Do teachers fail in class 12 board practicals? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, no one fails in class 12 boards practical. As everyone gets at least 65 -70 percentage marks in practical. So, I will advice you to concentrate on your theory paper rather than on practicals. Finally, I would like to say all the best for your board exams.

No. There is a very very rare chance of something like this. The teachers from your school will always tend to help you out. Don’t worry much about practicals. Focus on theory papers and of course, the upcoming competitive examinations.
No. Teachers won't fail you in board practicals Almost everyone gets full marks in board practicals but there are some students who don't know anything and they may get one or two marks less.

Hello. As far as i know no one fails you in 12th Practicals as your school also wants good results of their students so they'll do everything to give you fantastic marks in Practicals so that it'll help them in their school results. All the best. Hope it helps. Thank You
